activities.title: Arrival and Check-in
activities.description: Arrive in Paris and check-in to the comfortable hotel.

activities.title: Visit Louvre Museum
activities.description: Explore the world-renowned Louvre Museum and admire its art collection.

activities.title: Dinner at Le Procope
activities.description: Enjoy a delicious dinner at one of the oldest restaurants in Paris known for its traditional French cuisine.

activities.title: Montmartre Exploration
activities.description: Discover the charming neighborhood of Montmartre, visit Sacré-Cœur Basilica, and stroll through its artistic streets.

activities.title: Seine River Cruise
activities.description: Relax on a scenic Seine River cruise and enjoy views of Paris landmarks.

activities.title: Dinner at Le Marais
activities.description: Dine at a cozy restaurant in the vibrant Le Marais district known for its culinary scene.

activities.title: Versailles Palace Tour
activities.description: Visit the opulent Palace of Versailles and explore its gardens.

activities.title: Shopping at Champs-Élysées
activities.description: Indulge in some shopping at the famous Champs-Élysées avenue.

activities.title: Farewell Dinner at Le Cinq
activities.description: Experience a gourmet dinner at a Michelin-starred restaurant for a memorable evening.

activities.title: Relaxation and Check-out
activities.description: Enjoy a leisurely morning in Paris before checking out from the hotel.
